pages.text: $(b)Teleportation Items$() let you travel instantly across vast distances. Use them wisely!

pages.title: Respawn Mirror
pages.text: $(b)Respawn Mirror$()$(br2)Sets your respawn point to a specific location. Right-click to activate.$(br2)$(violet)Never lose your way home again!$()

pages.title: Silver Effigy
pages.text: $(b)Silver Effigy$()$(br2)A powerful protective totem. When held, it can save you from death with special effects.$(br2)$(violet)A second chance at life!$()
